item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30...am sure you will laugh and have a good time.  DAN MORGAN, Extreme Countyry Stampede Tour Battle of the Bands Champion will be the band this Saturday.  If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there....

BIG welcome to new member Tom Brodeur !  YEEHAW!!

 

MidnightRodeo Bar Extreme Country Stampede 2011 Champion-Dan Morgan will be performing at MRB, Saturday May 7th. MRB will be selling tickets to The Tour were you can see Dan perform with Nashville Artists Rachel Timberlake, Cory Cox, Jessie Brown, and Greg Burroughs. Every ticket purchased will be eligible for an "all access" backstage pass. Drawing every Sat. night (only tickets bought that night qualify) www.extremecountrytour.com   $30 for a one day pass or $50 for both days.
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
